entries.name: Age
entries: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Those left on the surface resent being abandoned by those who fled to the sky cities. They tend to the evil alignments.

entries.name: Size
entries: Surface Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

entries.name: Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write Grounder and Low Common.

entries.name: Human Adaptability
entries: You have proficiency in one skill of your choice, and gain one feat of your choice.

entries.name: Surface Endurance
entries: You are used to enduring the harsh conditions of the surface. You have advantage on Constitution saving throws.
